start.weNeedToAsk: We need to ask you a few questions before you can submit your appeal. It will only take a few minutes.
start.decisionLetter: You will need to have the decision letter that you received from the Home Office with you to answer some of the questions.

errors.invalidReference: Home office reference number does not match correct pattern

errors.tooShort: Must enter a reason for your appeal

error404.header: Sorry, this page could not be found

error500.content: Please try again in a few minutes.

additionalQuestion.title: Ask clarifying questions
additionalQuestion.description: Ask questions to clarify information with the apellant. You can see these initial response here

additionalQuestionReview.title: Carefully check your answer below before clicking submit

additionalQuestionEdition.title: Edit clarifying questions
additionalQuestionEdition.description: Ask questions to clarify information with the apellant. You can see these initial response here

additionalQuestionConfirmation.title: Direct the appellant to answer clarifying questions

nextSection.title: What happens next
nextSection.content: The appellant will be directed to answer the questions. You will be notified when they are ready to review.
nextSection.cta: Close and return to case details

errors.emptyFurtherQuestions: You have not entered a question. Enter the question you want the apellant to be presented with.
